/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
